name: Lollihops Racing
description:
Just the cutest battle-royale frog race for your twitch viewers.

A collaboration with  @magicalmegane and her frog themed stream but available to all.

"Why bore your viewers with rolling marbles when instead they can race some frogs!" -Everyone

Lollihops Racing is integrated with Twitch.tv's API and enables Twitch Streamers to involve their viewers in the game. This game is very community oriented and brings people together.  For a smaller streamer it can be a nice way to encourage several viewers to chat at once. 

This game is intended to be streamed.

You must connect it to twitch to be able to play.

You don't have to be live to test it out.

But it does need to connect to your chat.
